explains: v. 使弯曲；弯成弧形（curve 的 ing 形式）
wordGroup: characteristic curve 特性曲线；特征曲线
elliptic curve 椭圆曲线；橢圓曲線
growth curve 生长曲线，增长曲线
distribution curve 分布曲线；分配曲线
calibration curve 校正曲线，校准曲线
response curve 响应曲线；频率曲线；灵敏度特性曲线
phillips curve 菲利普斯曲线；菲利普曲线
cooling curve 冷却曲线；步冷曲线
transition curve 过渡曲线，介曲线；缓和曲线；转变曲线

sentences.en: The curving glass wall was made to order by Jeff Bell.
sentences.cn: 这面弯曲玻璃墙是由杰夫·贝尔定制的。

sentences.en: Eight monumental curving staircases of granite with over 4000 individually cast bronze balusters are capped by for skylight domes and two stained glass rotundas.
sentences.cn: 八个巨大的弯曲的花岗岩楼梯，上面有超过4000个单独铸造的青铜栏杆，顶部是天窗圆顶和两个彩色玻璃圆顶。

sentences.en: The fingers were gnarled, lumpy, with long, curving nails suggestive of animal claws.
sentences.cn: 那些手指粗糙、不平，有着又长又弯的使人想起动物爪子的指甲。
